MetaFormBlockTemplate.Name: Dependent files
Save button
Restore from template
MetaFormBlockTemplate.Source:
<script>
function @Prefix_@ViewName_ShowTemplates (grid, record)
{
 var parent = grid.findParentByType('gridpanel');
        if (parent == undefined) {
            parent = grid.findParentByType('treepanel');
        }

        var uid = parent.id.replace(new RegExp('grid', 'g'), '');
         var viewid = 'view' + uid;
        var view = Ext.getCmp(viewid);
        view.close();
        
        var extra = encodeURI('{"type":"template","name":"@ViewName"}');
	window.open(optimajet.CorrectUrl('/#WS/@FormName/GetContent?editform=@ViewName_Edit&selectquerytype=1&needredirect=false&extra=' + extra  + '&id=' + record.internalId ));

};
function @ViewName_OnGridId(newid )
{
var storeName = newid + '_store';
 optimajet.containerOnAvailable(storeName, function () {
 var proxy = optimajet.container[storeName].getProxy();
	proxy.extraParams['templatetype'] = '@TemplateType';
      });

};
 Ext.ComponentManager.onAvailable('@Prefix_@ViewName_grid', function(item) {
      var tb = optimajet.container.@Prefix_@ViewName_grid_toolbar;
      var btn = Ext.create('Ext.Button',{
	             id: '@Prefix_@ViewName_grid_toolbar_template',
	             text: '  ',
	             iconCls: 'toolbar-copy',
	               height: 37

	         });
	  tb.add(btn);       
	  
	  var onidavail = function(id){};
	  
	  btn.on('click',function(){
	  	var vfs = new ViewForSelectLoader('@Prefix_@ViewName_ShowTemplates');
	  	vfs.loadGrid('@Prefix_@ViewName', 'EntityTemplate', ' ', undefined, undefined, @ViewName_OnGridId);
	  });
    });   
    </script>

MetaFormBlockTemplate.Name: Edit form
Form. ROW END
Depend. Edit in window
Sync
MetaFormBlockTemplate.Source:
<script>
optimajet.containerOnAvailable('@ViewName_store',function(){
	optimajet.container.@ViewName_store.on('write', function ( store, operation, eOpts )
	{
		var resp = JSON.parse(operation.response.responseText);
		if (!resp.success)
			return;
		if (resp.processed.length < 0)
			return;
		if (operation.action != 'destroy')
		{
			optimajet.container.budgetsync.sync('@FormName',resp.processed,function(resp){
				if (!resp.success)
					ojControls.GenerateErrorBlock(resp.message).appendTo('#formMainErrors');
				else
					ojControls.GenerateSuccessBlock(resp.message).appendTo('#formMainErrors');
			},@UseVersions);
		}
	});
});
</script>

<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<head>
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width" />
    <style>
                #outlook a {
                    padding: 0;
                }

                body {
                    width: 100% !important;
                    min-width: 100%;
                    -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;
                    -ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;
                    margin: 0;
                    padding: 0;
                }

                .ExternalClass {
                    width: 100%;
                }

                    .ExternalClass,
                    .ExternalClass p,
                    .ExternalClass span,
                    .ExternalClass font,
                    .ExternalClass td,
                    .ExternalClass div {
                        line-height: 100%;
                    }

                #backgroundTable {
                    margin: 0;
                    padding: 0;
                    width: 100% !important;
                    line-height: 100% !important;
                }

                img {
                    outline: none;
                    text-decoration: none;
                    -ms-interpolation-mode: bicubic;
                    width: auto;
                    max-width: 100%;
                    float: left;
                    clear: both;
                    display: block;
                }

                center {
                    width: 100%;
                    min-width: 580px;
                }

                a img {
                    border: none;
                }

                p {
                    margin: 0 0 0 10px;
                }

                table {
                    border-spacing: 0;
                    border-collapse: collapse;
                }

                td {
                    word-break: break-word;
                    -webkit-hyphens: auto;
                    -moz-hyphens: auto;
                    hyphens: auto;
                    border-collapse: collapse !important;
                }

                table, tr, td {
                    padding: 0;
                    vertical-align: top;
                    text-align: left;
                }

                hr {
                    color: #d9d9d9;
                    background-color: #d9d9d9;
                    height: 1px;
                    border: none;
                }

                /* Responsive Grid */

                table.body {
                    height: 100%;
                    width: 100%;
                }

                table.container {
                    width: 580px;
                    margin: 0 auto;
                    text-align: inherit;
                }

                table.row {
                    padding: 0px;
                    width: 100%;
                    position: relative;
                }

                table.container table.row {
                    display: block;
                }

                td.wrapper {
                    padding: 10px 20px 0px 0px;
                    position: relative;
                }

                table.columns,
                table.column {
                    margin: 0 auto;
                }

                    table.columns td,
                    table.column td {
                        padding: 0px 0px 10px;
                    }

                        table.columns td.sub-columns,
                        table.column td.sub-columns,
                        table.columns td.sub-column,
                        table.column td.sub-column {
                            padding-right: 10px;
                        }

                td.sub-column, td.sub-columns {
                    min-width: 0px;
                }

                table.row td.last,
                table.container td.last {
                    padding-right: 0px;
                }

                table.one {
                    width: 30px;
                }

                table.two {
                    width: 80px;
                }

                table.three {
                    width: 130px;
                }

                table.four {
                    width: 180px;
                }

                table.five {
                    width: 230px;
                }

                table.six {
                    width: 280px;
                }

                table.seven {
                    width: 330px;
                }

                table.eight {
                    width: 380px;
                }

                table.nine {
                    width: 430px;
                }

                table.ten {
                    width: 480px;
                }

                table.eleven {
                    width: 530px;
                }

                table.twelve {
                    width: 580px;
                }

                table.one center {
                    min-width: 30px;
                }

                table.two center {
                    min-width: 80px;
                }

                table.three center {
                    min-width: 130px;
                }

                table.four center {
                    min-width: 180px;
                }

                table.five center {
                    min-width: 230px;
                }

                table.six center {
                    min-width: 280px;
                }

                table.seven center {
                    min-width: 330px;
                }

                table.eight center {
                    min-width: 380px;
                }

                table.nine center {
                    min-width: 430px;
                }

                table.ten center {
                    min-width: 480px;
                }

                table.eleven center {
                    min-width: 530px;
                }

                table.twelve center {
                    min-width: 580px;
                }

                table.one .panel center {
                    min-width: 10px;
                }

                table.two .panel center {
                    min-width: 60px;
                }

                table.three .panel center {
                    min-width: 110px;
                }

                table.four .panel center {
                    min-width: 160px;
                }

                table.five .panel center {
                    min-width: 210px;
                }

                table.six .panel center {
                    min-width: 260px;
                }

                table.seven .panel center {
                    min-width: 310px;
                }

                table.eight .panel center {
                    min-width: 360px;
                }

                table.nine .panel center {
                    min-width: 410px;
                }

                table.ten .panel center {
                    min-width: 460px;
                }

                table.eleven .panel center {
                    min-width: 510px;
                }

                table.twelve .panel center {
                    min-width: 560px;
                }

                .body .columns td.one,
                .body .column td.one {
                    width: 8.333333%;
                }

                .body .columns td.two,
                .body .column td.two {
                    width: 16.666666%;
                }

                .body .columns td.three,
                .body .column td.three {
                    width: 25%;
                }

                .body .columns td.four,
                .body .column td.four {
                    width: 33.333333%;
                }

                .body .columns td.five,
                .body .column td.five {
                    width: 41.666666%;
                }

                .body .columns td.six,
                .body .column td.six {
                    width: 50%;
                }

                .body .columns td.seven,
                .body .column td.seven {
                    width: 58.333333%;
                }

                .body .columns td.eight,
                .body .column td.eight {
                    width: 66.666666%;
                }

                .body .columns td.nine,
                .body .column td.nine {
                    width: 75%;
                }

                .body .columns td.ten,
                .body .column td.ten {
                    width: 83.333333%;
                }

                .body .columns td.eleven,
                .body .column td.eleven {
                    width: 91.666666%;
                }

                .body .columns td.twelve,
                .body .column td.twelve {
                    width: 100%;
                }

                td.offset-by-one {
                    padding-left: 50px;
                }

                td.offset-by-two {
                    padding-left: 100px;
                }

                td.offset-by-three {
                    padding-left: 150px;
                }

                td.offset-by-four {
                    padding-left: 200px;
                }

                td.offset-by-five {
                    padding-left: 250px;
                }

                td.offset-by-six {
                    padding-left: 300px;
                }

                td.offset-by-seven {
                    padding-left: 350px;
                }

                td.offset-by-eight {
                    padding-left: 400px;
                }

                td.offset-by-nine {
                    padding-left: 450px;
                }

                td.offset-by-ten {
                    padding-left: 500px;
                }

                td.offset-by-eleven {
                    padding-left: 550px;
                }

                td.expander {
                    visibility: hidden;
                    width: 0px;
                    padding: 0 !important;
                }

                table.columns .text-pad,
                table.column .text-pad {
                    padding-left: 10px;
                    padding-right: 10px;
                }

                table.columns .left-text-pad,
                table.columns .text-pad-left,
                table.column .left-text-pad,
                table.column .text-pad-left {
                    padding-left: 10px;
                }

                table.columns .right-text-pad,
                table.columns .text-pad-right,
                table.column .right-text-pad,
                table.column .text-pad-right {
                    padding-right: 10px;
                }

                /* Block Grid */

                .block-grid {
                    width: 100%;
                    max-width: 580px;
                }

                    .block-grid td {
                        display: inline-block;
                        padding: 10px;
                    }

                .two-up td {
                    width: 270px;
                }

                .three-up td {
                    width: 173px;
                }

                .four-up td {
                    width: 125px;
                }

                .five-up td {
                    width: 96px;
                }

                .six-up td {
                    width: 76px;
                }

                .seven-up td {
                    width: 62px;
                }

                .eight-up td {
                    width: 52px;
                }

                /* Alignment & Visibility Classes */

                table.center, td.center {
                    text-align: center;
                }

                h1.center,
                h2.center,
                h3.center,
                h4.center,
                h5.center,
                h6.center {
                    text-align: center;
                }

                span.center {
                    display: block;
                    width: 100%;
                    text-align: center;
                }

                img.center {
                    margin: 0 auto;
                    float: none;
                }

                .show-for-small,
                .hide-for-desktop {
                    display: none;
                }

                /* Typography */

                body, table.body, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p, td {
                    color: #222222;
                    font-family: "Helvetica", "Arial", sans-serif;
                    font-weight: normal;
                    padding: 0;
                    margin: 0;
                    text-align: left;
                    line-height: 1.3;
                }

                h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
                    word-break: normal;
                }

                h1 {
                    font-size: 40px;
                }

                h2 {
                    font-size: 36px;
                }

                h3 {
                    font-size: 32px;
                }

                h4 {
                    font-size: 28px;
                }

                h5 {
                    font-size: 24px;
                }

                h6 {
                    font-size: 20px;
                }

                body, table.body, p, td {
                    font-size: 14px;
                    line-height: 19px;
                }

                    p.lead, p.lede, p.leed {
                        font-size: 18px;
                        line-height: 21px;
                    }

                p {
                    margin-bottom: 10px;
                }

                small {
                    font-size: 10px;
                }

                a {
                    color: #2ba6cb;
                    text-decoration: none;
                }

                    a:hover {
                        color: #2795b6 !important;
                    }

                    a:active {
                        color: #2795b6 !important;
                    }

                    a:visited {
                        color: #2ba6cb !important;
                    }

                h1 a,
                h2 a,
                h3 a,
                h4 a,
                h5 a,
                h6 a {
                    color: #2ba6cb;
                }

                    h1 a:active,
                    h2 a:active,
                    h3 a:active,
                    h4 a:active,
                    h5 a:active,
                    h6 a:active {
                        color: #2ba6cb !important;
                    }

                    h1 a:visited,
                    h2 a:visited,
                    h3 a:visited,
                    h4 a:visited,
                    h5 a:visited,
                    h6 a:visited {
                        color: #2ba6cb !important;
                    }

                /* Panels */

                .panel {
                    background: #f2f2f2;
                    border: 1px solid #d9d9d9;
                    padding: 10px !important;
                }

                .sub-grid table {
                    width: 100%;
                }

                .sub-grid td.sub-columns {
                    padding-bottom: 0;
                }

                /* Buttons */

                table.button,
                table.tiny-button,
                table.small-button,
                table.medium-button,
                table.large-button {
                    width: 100%;
                    overflow: hidden;
                }

                    table.button td,
                    table.tiny-button td,
                    table.small-button td,
                    table.medium-button td,
                    table.large-button td {
                        display: block;
                        width: auto !important;
                        text-align: center;
                        background: #2ba6cb;
                        border: 1px solid #2284a1;
                        color: #ffffff;
                        padding: 8px 0;
                    }

                    table.tiny-button td {
                        padding: 5px 0 4px;
                    }

                    table.small-button td {
                        padding: 8px 0 7px;
                    }

                    table.medium-button td {
                        padding: 12px 0 10px;
                    }

                    table.large-button td {
                        padding: 21px 0 18px;
                    }

                        table.button td a,
                        table.tiny-button td a,
                        table.small-button td a,
                        table.medium-button td a,
                        table.large-button td a {
                            font-weight: bold;
                            text-decoration: none;
                            font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
                            color: #ffffff;
                            font-size: 16px;
                        }

                    table.tiny-button td a {
                        font-size: 12px;
                        font-weight: normal;
                    }

                    table.small-button td a {
                        font-size: 16px;
                    }

                    table.medium-button td a {
                        font-size: 20px;
                    }

                    table.large-button td a {
                        font-size: 24px;
                    }

                    table.button:hover td,
                    table.button:visited td,
                    table.button:active td {
                        background: #2795b6 !important;
                    }

                        table.button:hover td a,
                        table.button:visited td a,
                        table.button:active td a {
                            color: #fff !important;
                        }

                    table.button:hover td,
                    table.tiny-button:hover td,
                    table.small-button:hover td,
                    table.medium-button:hover td,
                    table.large-button:hover td {
                        background: #2795b6 !important;
                    }

                        table.button:hover td a,
                        table.button:active td a,
                        table.button td a:visited,
                        table.tiny-button:hover td a,
                        table.tiny-button:active td a,
                        table.tiny-button td a:visited,
                        table.small-button:hover td a,
                        table.small-button:active td a,
                        table.small-button td a:visited,
                        table.medium-button:hover td a,
                        table.medium-button:active td a,
                        table.medium-button td a:visited,
                        table.large-button:hover td a,
                        table.large-button:active td a,
                        table.large-button td a:visited {
                            color: #ffffff !important;
                        }

                table.secondary td {
                    background: #e9e9e9;
                    border-color: #d0d0d0;
                    color: #555;
                }

                    table.secondary td a {
                        color: #555;
                    }

                table.secondary:hover td {
                    background: #d0d0d0 !important;
                    color: #555;
                }

                    table.secondary:hover td a,
                    table.secondary td a:visited,
                    table.secondary:active td a {
                        color: #555 !important;
                    }

                table.success td {
                    background: #5da423;
                    border-color: #457a1a;
                }

                table.success:hover td {
                    background: #457a1a !important;
                }

                table.alert td {
                    background: #c60f13;
                    border-color: #970b0e;
                }

                table.alert:hover td {
                    background: #970b0e !important;
                }

                table.radius td {
                    -webkit-border-radius: 3px;
                    -moz-border-radius: 3px;
                    border-radius: 3px;
                }

                table.round td {
                    -webkit-border-radius: 500px;
                    -moz-border-radius: 500px;
                    border-radius: 500px;
                }

                /* Outlook First */

                body.outlook p {
                    display: inline !important;
                }

                /*  Media Queries */

                @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {

                    table[class="body"] img {
                        width: auto !important;
                        height: auto !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] center {
                        min-width: 0 !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .container {
                        width: 95% !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .row {
                        width: 100% !important;
                        display: block !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .wrapper {
                        display: block !important;
                        padding-right: 0 !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .columns,
                    table[class="body"] .column {
                        table-layout: fixed !important;
                        float: none !important;
                        width: 100% !important;
                        padding-right: 0px !important;
                        padding-left: 0px !important;
                        display: block !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .wrapper.first .columns,
                    table[class="body"] .wrapper.first .column {
                        display: table !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] table.columns td,
                    table[class="body"] table.column td {
                        width: 100% !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .columns td.one,
                    table[class="body"] .column td.one {
                        width: 8.333333% !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .columns td.two,
                    table[class="body"] .column td.two {
                        width: 16.666666% !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .columns td.three,
                    table[class="body"] .column td.three {
                        width: 25% !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .columns td.four,
                    table[class="body"] .column td.four {
                        width: 33.333333% !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .columns td.five,
                    table[class="body"] .column td.five {
                        width: 41.666666% !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .columns td.six,
                    table[class="body"] .column td.six {
                        width: 50% !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .columns td.seven,
                    table[class="body"] .column td.seven {
                        width: 58.333333% !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .columns td.eight,
                    table[class="body"] .column td.eight {
                        width: 66.666666% !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .columns td.nine,
                    table[class="body"] .column td.nine {
                        width: 75% !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .columns td.ten,
                    table[class="body"] .column td.ten {
                        width: 83.333333% !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .columns td.eleven,
                    table[class="body"] .column td.eleven {
                        width: 91.666666% !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .columns td.twelve,
                    table[class="body"] .column td.twelve {
                        width: 100% !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] td.offset-by-one,
                    table[class="body"] td.offset-by-two,
                    table[class="body"] td.offset-by-three,
                    table[class="body"] td.offset-by-four,
                    table[class="body"] td.offset-by-five,
                    table[class="body"] td.offset-by-six,
                    table[class="body"] td.offset-by-seven,
                    table[class="body"] td.offset-by-eight,
                    table[class="body"] td.offset-by-nine,
                    table[class="body"] td.offset-by-ten,
                    table[class="body"] td.offset-by-eleven {
                        padding-left: 0 !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] table.columns td.expander {
                        width: 1px !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .right-text-pad,
                    table[class="body"] .text-pad-right {
                        padding-left: 10px !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .left-text-pad,
                    table[class="body"] .text-pad-left {
                        padding-right: 10px !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .hide-for-small,
                    table[class="body"] .show-for-desktop {
                        display: none !important;
                    }

                    table[class="body"] .show-for-small,
                    table[class="body"] .hide-for-desktop {
                        display: inherit !important;
                    }
                }
    </style>
    <style>
        table.facebook td {
            background: #3b5998;
            border-color: #2d4473;
        }

        table.facebook:hover td {
            background: #2d4473 !important;
        }

        table.twitter td {
            background: #00acee;
            border-color: #0087bb;
        }

        table.twitter:hover td {
            background: #0087bb !important;
        }

        table.google-plus td {
            background-color: #DB4A39;
            border-color: #CC0000;
        }

        table.google-plus:hover td {
            background: #CC0000 !important;
        }

        .template-label {
            color: #ffffff;
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 11px;
        }

        .callout .wrapper {
            padding-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .callout .panel {
            background: #ECF8FF;
            border-color: #b9e5ff;
        }

        .header {
            background: @HeaderColor;
            /*
                Positive=#0aa699
                Negative=#f35958
            */
        }

        .footer .wrapper {
            background: #ebebeb;
        }

        .footer h5 {
            padding-bottom: 10px;
        }

        table.columns .text-pad {
            padding-left: 10px;
            padding-right: 10px;
        }

        table.columns .left-text-pad {
            padding-left: 10px;
        }

        table.columns .right-text-pad {
            padding-right: 10px;
        }

        @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {

            table[class="body"] .right-text-pad {
                padding-left: 10px !important;
            }

            table[class="body"] .left-text-pad {
                padding-right: 10px !important;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <table class="body">
        <tr>
            <td class="center" align="center" valign="top">
                <center>

                    <table class="row header">
                        <tr>
                            <td class="center" align="center">
                                <center>

                                    <table class="container">
                                        <tr>
                                            <td class="wrapper last">

                                                <table class="twelve columns">
                                                    <tr>
                                                        <td class="six sub-columns" >
                                                            <h3><b style="color:#fff">@ApplicationName</b></h3>
                                                        </td>
                                                        <td class="six sub-columns last" style="text-align:right; vertical-align:middle;">
                                                            <span class="template-label"></span>
                                                        </td>
                                                        <td class="expander"></td>
                                                    </tr>
                                                </table>

                                            </td>
                                        </tr>
                                    </table>

                                </center>
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>

                    <table class="container">
                        <tr>
                            <td>
                                <table class="row">
                                    <tr>
                                        <td class="wrapper last">

                                            <table class="twelve columns">
                                                <tr>
                                                    <td>
                                                        <p class="lead">
                                                            @Message
                                                        </p>
                                                        <div>
                                                            @WFInfo
                                                        </div>
                                                        <div>
                                                            @PrintForm
                                                        </div>
                                                    </td>
                                                </tr>
                                            </table>

                                        </td>
                                    </tr>
                                </table>

                                <table class="row callout">
                                    <tr>
                                        <td class="wrapper last">

                                            <table class="twelve columns">
                                                <tr>
                                                    <td class="panel">
                                                        <p style="text-align: center;"> You can change the notification settings in the user profile.</p>
                                                    </td>
                                                </tr>
                                            </table>

                                        </td>
                                    </tr>
                                </table>                              
                            </td>
                        </tr>
                    </table>

                </center>
            </td>
        </tr>
    </table>
</body>
</html>

MetaEditFormTemplate.Name: TwoColumns
RowColumns20_Div
RowColumns20
MetaEditFormTemplate.Template:
@for (var i = 0; Model.Controls.Where(c=> (c.SortOrder ?? 1) > i*20).Count() > 0 ; i++){
@for (var j = 0; j < 20; j++){ var sortIndex = i*20 + j; var items = Model.Controls.Where(c=> (c.SortOrder ?? 1) == sortIndex); if (items.Count() > 0){ } }
@foreach(var item in items){ @item.ContextHelp
}
}
@if (@Model.HaveSaveButon || @Model.HaveSaveAndExitButon || @Model.HaveExitButon) {
@if (@Model.HaveSaveButon) {
} @if (@Model.HaveSaveAndExitButon) {
} @if (@Model.HaveExitButon) {

	optimajet.container.form_AllocationModel_Edit_store = undefined;

			if(isSuccess && respData != null){

			 }}, true);

function FormFinishValidate(){	
	var valid = true;	
	var error;
	
	var weight = optimajet.container.form_AllocationModelItem_store.sum('weight');
	if((weight).toFixed(2) != 100){
		valid = false;
		error = 'Cumulative percentage in allocative model must be equal to 100%';

		ojControls.GenerateErrorBlock(error).appendTo('#formMainErrors');	
	}
		
	return valid;
}

Block.Source:
<script>
<dwkit type="Store">
    <MetaViewName>EntityAccessItemEntity</MetaViewName>
    <storename>form</storename>
    <beidname>EntityAccessItemId_EntityAccessId</beidname>
    <beidvalue>@id</beidvalue>
    <Visibility>@visibility</Visibility>
    <Extra>@extra</Extra>
</dwkit>

Ext.ComponentManager.onAvailable('form_EntityAccessItem_grid', function (item) {

    var toolbar_copy = Ext.getCmp('form_EntityAccessItem_grid_toolbar_copy');
    if (toolbar_copy != undefined) {
        toolbar_copy.hide();
    }

    item.setSize();

    item.on('edit', function (grid) {
        optimajet.container.entityaccessitem_EntityAccessItemEntity_store = undefined;
        optimajet.containerStoreOnLoad('entityaccessitem_EntityAccessItemEntity_store', function () {
            var store = optimajet.container.form_EntityAccessItemEntity_store;
            var secondaryStore = optimajet.container.entityaccessitem_EntityAccessItemEntity_store;

            var id = Ext.getCmp('form_EntityAccessItem_grid').editingRecord.internalId;

            store.data.items.forEach(function (item) {
                if (item.get('entityaccessitemid') == id) {
                    secondaryStore.add(item.data);
                }
            });
        });
    });

    //   
    item.getView().getRowClass = function (row, index) {
        if (row.get('parententityaccessitemid') != '')
            return 'hide';
    };
});


optimajet.containerOnAvailable('form_EntityAccessItem_store', function () {

    optimajet.container.form_EntityAccessItem_store.on('remove', function (store, record, index, isMove, eOpts) {
        EntityAccessItem_DeleteGenerated(store, record.get('id'));
        EntityAccessItem_Delete(record);
        Ext.getCmp('form_EntityAccessItem_grid').view.refresh();
    });
});

function EntityAccessItem_DeleteGenerated(itemStore, itemId) {
    itemStore.remove(itemStore.queryBy(function (item) {
            return item.get('parententityaccessitemid') == itemId
        }).items
    );
}

function EntityAccessItem_Generate(itemId, tableName, entityIds, deep, itemStore, itemEntityStore) {
    var autoGeneratedAccesses = optimajet.GetBusinessObject('GetDependingEntityAccess', [
        {name: 'metaviewName', value: tableName },
        {name: 'ids', value: entityIds},
        {name: 'deep', value: deep}
    ]);

    if (autoGeneratedAccesses == null) {
        return;
    }

    itemStore.suspendEvents();
    itemEntityStore.suspendEvents();
    autoGeneratedAccesses.forEach(function (item) {
        var newentityaccessitem_id = optimajet.NewGuid();
        var entityaccessitem = {
            accessentities: '',
            id: newentityaccessitem_id,
            parententityaccessitemid: itemId,
            metadataentityid: item.Item1,
            metadataentityid_tablename: item.Item2,
            deep: 0
        };
        itemStore.add(entityaccessitem);

        item.Item3.forEach(function (itemEntity) {
            var entityaccessitem_entity = {
                accessentitycaption: itemEntity.Item2,
                entityaccessitemid: newentityaccessitem_id,
                entityaccessitemid_entityaccessid: itemEntityStore.data.items[0].get('entityaccessitemid_entityaccessid'),
                entityid: itemEntity.Item1,
                id: optimajet.NewGuid()
            };
            itemEntityStore.add(entityaccessitem_entity);
        });
    });
    itemStore.resumeEvents();
    itemEntityStore.resumeEvents();
}

function EntityAccessItem_Cancel() {
    optimajet.container.entityaccessitem_EntityAccessItem_Edit_exit();
}

function EntityAccessItem_Delete(record) {
    var id = record.get('id');
    var line = optimajet.container.form_EntityAccessItemEntity_store;

    for (var i = line.data.items.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        if (line.data.items[i].get('entityaccessitemid') == id) {
            line.removeAt(i);
            // 
            line.removed = new Array();
        }
    }
}

function EntityAccessItem_Save() {
    $('div#accessItemErrors')[0].innerHTML = '';
    
     var entityaccessitem_gridControl = Ext.getCmp('entityaccessitem_EntityAccessItemEntity_grid');
    if (entityaccessitem_gridControl.editingPlugin.editing) {
        entityaccessitem_gridControl.editingPlugin.cancelEdit();
    }

    var source = optimajet.container.entityaccessitem_EntityAccessItemEntity_store;

    if (source.getCount() <= 0) {
        $('div#accessItemErrors').append(ojControls.GenerateErrorBlock(optimajet.localization.get('NoEntity')));
        return;
    }
    var usedNames = [];
    var usedNameStr = '';
    for (var i = 0; i < source.getCount(); i++) {
        var row = source.data.getAt(i);
        var name = row.get('accessentitycaption');
        if ($.inArray(name, usedNames) != -1) {
            $('div#accessItemErrors').append(ojControls.GenerateErrorBlock(optimajet.localization.get('UniqueEntities')));
            return;
        }
        usedNames.push(name);

        if (usedNameStr.length > 0) {
            usedNameStr += ', ';
        }
        usedNameStr += name;
    }

    if (!optimajet.container.entityaccessitem_EntityAccessItem_Edit_save())
        return;

    var editingRecord = Ext.getCmp('form_EntityAccessItem_grid').editingRecord;
    var id = editingRecord.get('id');

    if (id == null) {
        id = optimajet.NewGuid();
        editingRecord.setId(id);
    }
    else {
        //   
        EntityAccessItem_DeleteGenerated(optimajet.container.form_EntityAccessItem_store, id);
    }

    var entityids = [];
    source.data.items.forEach(function (item) {
        if (item.get('id') == undefined) {
            item.set('id', optimajet.NewGuid());
            item.set('entityaccessitemid', id);
        }
        entityids.push(item.get('entityid'));
    });

    editingRecord.set('accessentities', usedNameStr);

    var target = optimajet.container.form_EntityAccessItemEntity_store;

    var properties = ['entityaccessitemid',
        'entityaccessitemid_entityaccessid',
        'accessentitycaption',
        'id',
        'lockversion',
        'entityid'];

    ojControls.SyncStore(source, target, 'id', properties, 'entityaccessitemid', id);

    EntityAccessItem_Generate(id, editingRecord.get('metadataentityid_tablename'), entityids, Ext.getCmp('entityaccessitem_Deep_control').value,
        optimajet.container.form_EntityAccessItem_store, optimajet.container.form_EntityAccessItemEntity_store);

    optimajet.container.entityaccessitem_EntityAccessItem_Edit_exit();
}
</script>

Block.Name: Form
Block.Source:
<script>

ojControls.ExtSetAllowBlank([
	'invoiceallocation_Weight_control',
	'invoiceallocation_Amount_control',
	'invoiceallocation_CAPEXOPEX_control'], false);

Ext.getCmp('invoiceallocation_Weight_control').on("change", function(cntl, newValue, oldValue, eOpts){
	InvoiceAllocationCheckAmount(1);
});

Ext.getCmp('invoiceallocation_Amount_control').on("change", function(cntl, newValue, oldValue, eOpts){
	InvoiceAllocationCheckAmount(0);
});

var invoiceAllocationCalcCycleBlock = 0;
function InvoiceAllocationCheckAmount(type){
	if(invoiceAllocationCalcCycleBlock)
		return;

	if(type == 0){
		var formamount = Ext.getCmp('form_Amount_control').getValue();
		var amount =  Ext.getCmp('invoiceallocation_Amount_control').getValue();
		var weight = 0;
		
		if(formamount == null || amount  == null || formamount  == 0){
			weight = 0;
		}
		else{
			weight = amount / formamount  * 100;
			weight  = weight.toFixed(2);
		}
		
		invoiceAllocationCalcCycleBlock  = 1;
		Ext.getCmp('invoiceallocation_Weight_control').setValue(weight);
		invoiceAllocationCalcCycleBlock  = 0;
	}
	else{
		var formamount = Ext.getCmp('form_Amount_control').getValue();
		var weight =  Ext.getCmp('invoiceallocation_Weight_control').getValue();
		var amount = 0;
		
		if(formamount == null || weight == null || weight  == 0){
			amount = 0;
		}
		else{
			amount = formamount * weight / 100;
			amount   = amount.toFixed(2);
		}
		
		invoiceAllocationCalcCycleBlock  = 1;
		Ext.getCmp('invoiceallocation_Amount_control').setValue(amount);
		invoiceAllocationCalcCycleBlock  = 0;
	}
}
</script>

Ext.ComponentManager.onAvailable('entityaccessitem_EntityAccessItemEntity_grid', function (item) {
    var toolbar_copy = Ext.getCmp('entityaccessitem_EntityAccessItemEntity_grid_toolbar_copy');
    if (toolbar_copy != undefined) {
        toolbar_copy.hide();
    }
    item.setSize();
    var gridColumns = item.columns, gridDataIndices = Ext.Array.pluck(item.columns, 'dataIndex');
    var entityIdColumn = gridColumns[Ext.Array.indexOf(gridDataIndices, 'entityid')];
    entityIdColumn.hide();
    var accessEntityColumn = gridColumns[Ext.Array.indexOf(gridDataIndices, 'accessentitycaption')];

    item.on('beforeedit', function (old_editor, obj, options) {
        var tableName = Ext.getCmp('entityaccessitem_MetadataEntityId_TableName_control').getValue();
        var bindingField = Ext.util.Format.lowercase(optimajet.GetBusinessObject('GetEntityCaptionAttribute', [{name: 'metaviewName', value: tableName}]));
        var dictionaryFieldEditor = Ext.create('Ext.ux.optimajet.DictionaryField', {
            id: 'entityaccessitem_EntityAccessItemEntity_AccessEntity_dictionaryfield',
            fieldName: 'accessentitycaption',
            viewName: tableName,
            windowCaption: 'Selection: ' + tableName,
            width: '100%',
            allowBlank: false,
            fieldNameToBind: bindingField,
            gridType: tableName.indexOf('OrganizationalStructure') != -1 ? optimajet.GridType.Tree : optimajet.GridType.Grid
        });
        var editor = entityIdColumn.getEditor();
        editor.fieldName = 'entityid';
        editor.parentAttributeId = '';
        editor.readOnly = true;
        editor.fieldNameToBind = 'id';
        accessEntityColumn.setEditor(dictionaryFieldEditor);
        entityIdColumn.setEditor(editor);
        
    });
});

<script>
Ext.ComponentManager.onAvailable('form_BudgetItemAllocation_grid', function(item) {
			
	item.columns[0].summaryType = 'count';
	item.columns[0].summaryRenderer = function (value, summaryData, dataIndex) {
                return Ext.String.format(optimajet.localization.get('Total') + ':');
            };            
	
	item.columns.forEach(function(col){
		if(col.dataIndex == 'weight'){
			col.summaryType = 'sum';
		}
	});	
	
	item.setSize();	
	
	if(item.editingPlugin != undefined && item.editingPlugin.getEditor() != undefined){
		item.editingPlugin.getEditor().getForm().findField('weight').allowBlank = false;
		
		var grid_toolbar= optimajet.container.form_BudgetItemAllocation_grid_toolbar;

		var btnAM =grid_toolbar.add({
	            id: grid_toolbar.id + '_grid_toolbar_setallocationmodel',
	            text: optimajet.localization.get('Allocation model'),
	            iconCls: 'toolbar-sitemap',
	            height: 37	            
	        });
	        
	        btnAM.on('click', function(){	        	
	        	var vfs = new ViewForSelectLoader('@Prefix_@ViewName_SetAllocationModel');
		  	vfs.loadGrid('@Prefix_@ViewName_AllocationModel', 'AllocationModel', 
		  	optimajet.localization.get('Select allocation model'));
	        });
	        
	        ojControls.GenerateImportExportButtonClient('BudgetItemAllocationImport', 'form_BudgetItemAllocation', @Prefix_@ViewName_ImportCallback);
	}
});

function @Prefix_@ViewName_SetAllocationModel (grid, record)
{
	var parent = grid.findParentByType('gridpanel');
        if (parent == undefined) {
            parent = grid.findParentByType('treepanel');
        }

        var uid = parent.id.replace(new RegExp('grid', 'g'), '');
        var viewid = 'view' + uid;
        var view = Ext.getCmp(viewid);
        view.close();
        
	var res = optimajet.GetBusinessObject('GetAllocationModel', [{ name: 'Id', 	value: record.internalId }]);
	if(res != undefined){
		
		var store = optimajet.container.form_BudgetItemAllocation_store;
		store.removeAll();
		res.forEach(function(item){
		        var row = store.model.create();
			row.set('costcenterid', item.costcenterid);
			row.set('costcenterid_code', item.costcenterid_code);
			row.set('legalentityid', item.legalentityid);
			row.set('legalentityid_name', item.legalentityid_name);
			row.set('weight', item.weight);			
			row.set('budgetitemid', '@id');
			optimajet.container.form_BudgetItemAllocation_store.add(row);
		});		
	}	
};

function @Prefix_@ViewName_ImportCallback (viewname, name, response)
{
	var records = Ext.decode(response.responseText).records;
	if(records != undefined){
		
		var store = optimajet.container.form_BudgetItemAllocation_store;
		store.removeAll();
		records.forEach(function(item){
		        var row = store.model.create();
			row.set('costcenterid', item.costcenterid);
			row.set('costcenterid_code', item.costcenterid_code);
			row.set('legalentityid', item.legalentityid);
			row.set('legalentityid_name', item.legalentityid_name);
			row.set('weight', item.weight);			
			row.set('budgetitemid', '@id');
			optimajet.container.form_BudgetItemAllocation_store.add(row);
		});		
	}
};
</script>

	if(useDesigner){
		$('#rowDesigner').show();
		$('#divStages').parent().hide();
		$('#divOrg').parent().parent()[0].className = "col-md-12"
		$('#divOrg').parent().children('div.grid-title').children('h4').click();
		
		var row = optimajet.container.form_EntityRoute_Edit_store.first();
		if(row == undefined){
			wfdesignerRedraw();
		}
		else{
			wfdesignerRedraw(row.get('id'));
		}
	}
	else{
		$('#rowDesigner').hide();
		$('#divOrg').parent().parent()[0].className = "col-md-6";
		$('#divStages').parent().show();
		$('#divOrg').parent().children('div.grid-title').children('h4').click();
		
		Ext.getCmp('form_EntityRouteItem_grid').update();
		Ext.getCmp('form_EntityRouteUser_grid').update();
	}
};

function form_EntityRoute_Edit_store_LoadComplete(){
	Ext.getCmp('form_IsUseDesigner_control').on("change", function(cntl, newValue, oldValue, eOpts){
       	    	checkShowDesigner();	        	
	});
	checkShowDesigner();
}

</script>

<script>
   <dwkit type="Store">
   	<MetaViewName>EntityRouteItemSighters</MetaViewName>
   	<storename>form</storename>
   	<beidname>EntityRouteItemId_EntityRouteId</beidname>
	<beidvalue>@id</beidvalue>

   </dwkit>
   
   Ext.ComponentManager.onAvailable('form_EntityRouteItem_grid', function(item) {
	
	var toolbar_copy = Ext.getCmp('form_EntityRouteItem_grid_toolbar_copy');
	if(toolbar_copy != undefined){
		toolbar_copy.hide();
	}
	
	item.setSize();	
	
	item.on('edit', function(grid){
	
		optimajet.container.entityrouteitem_EntityRouteItemSighters_store = undefined;
		optimajet.containerStoreOnLoad('entityrouteitem_EntityRouteItemSighters_store', function(){
			var store  = optimajet.container.form_EntityRouteItemSighters_store;
			var secondaryStore = optimajet.container.entityrouteitem_EntityRouteItemSighters_store;
		
			var id = Ext.getCmp('form_EntityRouteItem_grid').editingRecord.internalId;
		
			store.data.items.forEach(function(item){
				if(item.get('entityrouteitemid') == id ){
					secondaryStore.add(item.data);
				}	
			});	
		});
	});	
});


optimajet.containerOnAvailable('form_EntityRouteItem_store', function(){
	optimajet.container.form_EntityRouteItem_store.on('remove', function(store, record, index, isMove, eOpts){
		EntityRouteItem_Delete(record, store);
	});
});



function EntityRouteItem_Cancel(){
	optimajet.container.entityrouteitem_EntityRouteItem_Edit_exit();
}

function EntityRouteItem_Delete(record, ms){
 	var id = record.get('id');
	var line = optimajet.container.form_EntityRouteItemSighters_store;
	for(var i=line.data.items.length - 1; i >= 0 ; i--){	
		if(line.data.items[i].get('entityrouteitemid') == id){
			line.removeAt(i);
			// 
			line.removed = new Array();
		}
	}
	en = Enumerable.From(ms.removed);
	en.Where(function(item) { return item.data.lockversion == ""; }).ForEach(function(item) { ms.removed.splice(ms.removed.indexOf(item)); });
}

function EntityRouteItem_Save(){
	
	$('div#routeItemErrors')[0].innerHTML = '';
	
	var source = optimajet.container.entityrouteitem_EntityRouteItemSighters_store;
	var entityrouteitem_gridControl = Ext.getCmp('entityrouteitem_EntityRouteItemSighters_grid');
	if (entityrouteitem_gridControl.editingPlugin.editing) {
		entityrouteitem_gridControl.editingPlugin.cancelEdit();
	}
    	
	if (source.getCount()<= 0)
	{
		$('div#routeItemErrors').append(ojControls.GenerateErrorBlock("You must specify at least one user"));
		return;
	}
	var usedNames = new Array();
	var usedNameStr = '';
	for (var i = 0; i < source.getCount(); i++)
	{
		var row = source.data.getAt(i);
		var name =row.get('securityuserid_name');
		if ($.inArray(name, usedNames) != -1)
		{
			$('div#routeItemErrors').append(ojControls.GenerateErrorBlock("Users must be unique"));
			return;
		}
		usedNames.push(name);
		
		if(usedNameStr.length > 0){
			usedNameStr += ', ';
		}
		usedNameStr += name;		
	}
	
	var grid = Ext.getCmp('form_EntityRouteItem_grid');
	
	var numberToSave = Ext.getCmp('entityrouteitem_Number_control').getValue();
	var idToSave =  grid.editingRecord == undefined ? null :   grid.editingRecord.get('id');
	var formStore = optimajet.container.form_EntityRouteItem_store;

	for (var i = 0; i < formStore.getCount(); i++)
	{
		var row = formStore.getAt(i);
		if (row.get('number') == numberToSave && row.getId() != idToSave )
		{
			$('div#routeItemErrors').append(ojControls.GenerateErrorBlock("Number must be unique"));
			return;
		}  
	}
	
	
	if (!optimajet.container.entityrouteitem_EntityRouteItem_Edit_save())
		return;
	
	var editingRecord =  Ext.getCmp('form_EntityRouteItem_grid').editingRecord;
	var id = editingRecord.get('id');
	
	if (id == null)
	{
		id =  optimajet.NewGuid();
		editingRecord.setId(id);
		
	}
	
		
	
	source.data.items.forEach(function(item){
		if(item.get('id') == undefined){
			item.set('id', optimajet.NewGuid());
			item.set('entityrouteitemid', id);
		}		
	});
	
	editingRecord.set('sighters', usedNameStr );	
	
	var target = optimajet.container.form_EntityRouteItemSighters_store;	
	
	var properties = ['entityrouteitemid',
				'entityrouteitemid_entityrouteid',
			        'id',
				'lockversion',
				'securityuserid',
				'securityuserid_name'];
								
	ojControls.SyncStore(source, target, 'id', properties , 'entityrouteitemid', id );

	

	optimajet.container.entityrouteitem_EntityRouteItem_Edit_exit();
}


 </script>

<script>
	optimajet.container.form_Budget_Edit_store = undefined;
	optimajet.container.form_BudgetVersion_store = undefined;

function FormPrepareData(){	
	$('#formMainErrors')[0].innerHTML = '';
}

	function FormCustomSave(callback, nothingchangesignore){

		FormPrepareData();
		
		var stores = [
			optimajet.container.form_BudgetVersion_store
		];
		
		optimajet.StoresSave(optimajet.container.form_Budget_Edit_store, stores, '@visibility', false, callback, FormFinishValidate, nothingchangesignore);
	}
	
	function FormSave(){
		FormCustomSave(function(respData, isSuccess)	{
			if(isSuccess && respData != null){
				optimajet.container.form_Budget_Edit_store.ExtensionReload(respData.processed[0]);
			 }}, true);
	}

	function FormSaveExit(){
		FormCustomSave(function(respData, isSuccess)	{
			if(isSuccess){
				$('#form_BackUrl')[0].click();
			 }
		}, true);
	}
	

function CurrentVersionValidate(obj) {
	obj.valid = true;
	obj.error = '';
	
	if('@id' == '')
		return;
	
	var isCurrentCount = 0;
	optimajet.container.form_BudgetVersion_store.data.items.forEach(function(item) { isCurrentCount += item.data.iscurrent; })
	
	if (isCurrentCount  > 1) {
		obj.valid = false;
		obj.error = optimajet.localization.get('CurrentBudgetVersionOneOnly');
	}
	else if (isCurrentCount  < 1) {
		obj.valid = false;
		obj.error = optimajet.localization.get('OneCurrentBudgetVersion');	
	}
}
	
function FormFinishValidate(){	
	var valid = true;	
	var error;
	
	var o = new Object();
	CurrentVersionValidate(o);
	valid = o.valid;
	error = o.error;
	
	if(!valid){
		ojControls.GenerateErrorBlock(error).appendTo('#formMainErrors');	
	}
	
	return valid;
}
</script>

<script>
	optimajet.container.form_Contract_Edit_store = undefined;

function ChangeControlsVisible(v) {
	var type = Ext.getCmp('form_ContractTypeId_control').getValue();
	var jqCancelationNoticePeriod = $('#form_CancelationNoticePeriod_labelplaceholder').parents('tr');
	var jqCurrency = $('#form_CurrencyId_Code_labelplaceholder').parents('tr');
	var jqContractAmount = $('#form_ContractAmount_labelplaceholder').parents('tr');
	var jqExpirationDate = $('#form_ExpirationDate_labelplaceholder').parents('tr');
	var ejCancelationNoticePeriod = 'form_CancelationNoticePeriod_control';
	var ejCurrency = 'form_CurrencyId_Code_control';
	var ejContractAmount = 'form_ContractAmount_control';
	var ejExpirationDate = 'form_ExpirationDate_control'
	if (jqContractAmount  != undefined)
	{
		SetVisibleAndRequired(jqCancelationNoticePeriod, ejCancelationNoticePeriod, type == 2 || type == 3);
		SetVisibleAndRequired(jqContractAmount, ejContractAmount , type == 1);
		SetVisibleAndRequired(jqCurrency , ejCurrency, type == 1);
		SetVisibleAndRequired(jqExpirationDate, ejExpirationDate, type == 3);
		$('#'+ejCurrency ).width($('#'+ejContractAmount ).width());
	}
}

function SetVisibleAndRequired(jqControl, ejControl, visible)
{
	if (visible)
	{
		jqControl.show();		
	}
	else
	{
		jqControl.hide();
	}
	
	var controls = new Array();
	if (Ext.getCmp(ejControl) != undefined)
	{
		controls.push(ejControl);
	}
	ojControls.ExtSetAllowBlank(controls, !visible);
}

Ext.ComponentManager.onAvailable('form_ContractTypeId_control', function(item) { 		
 	item.on("change", function(cntl, newValue, oldValue, eOpts){
       	    	ChangeControlsVisible(newValue);

});

<script>
Ext.ComponentManager.onAvailable('form_InvoiceBudgetItem_grid', function(item) {
			
	item.columns[0].summaryRenderer = function (value, summaryData, dataIndex) {
                return Ext.String.format(optimajet.localization.get('Total') + ':');
            };            
	
	item.columns.forEach(function(col){
		if(col.dataIndex == 'amount' || col.dataIndex == 'residual'){
			col.summaryType = 'sum';
		}
	});	
	
	item.on('validateedit', function(editor, e) {

		if(e.newValues.nextperiodyear != '' && e.newValues.nextperiodyear != undefined)
		{		
			if(e.newValues.nextperiodyear <= optimajet.budget.getYear()){
				editor.editor.getForm().findField('nextperiodyear').markInvalid(optimajet.localization.get('You can only specify future years!'));		
				return false;
			}
		}
		else if(optimajet.budget.useAmountControl && e.newValues.residual.toFixed(2) < e.newValues.amount.toFixed(2)){
			editor.editor.getForm().findField('amount').markInvalid(optimajet.localization.get('Amount must be less than or equal to the residue!'));		
			return false;
		}
		
		return true;			
	});
	
	item.setSize();	
	
	if(item.editingPlugin != undefined && item.editingPlugin.getEditor() != undefined){
		var editForm = item.editingPlugin.getEditor().getForm();
		editForm.findField('budgetitemid_numberid').allowBlank = false;
		editForm.findField('amount').allowBlank = false;
		
		var budgetitemselector = editForm.findField('budgetitemid_numberid');
		item.on('beforeedit', function(editor, e) {
			var year = editForm.findField("nextperiodyear").getValue();
			budgetitemselector.ProxyCustomUrl = InvoiceGetBudgetItemProxyUrl(year);
			
		});
		
		editForm.findField("budgetitemid").on('change', function( sender, newValue, oldValue, eOpts ){
			InvoiceDetailRestUpdate(editForm);
		});
		
		editForm.findField("nextperiodyear").on('change', function( sender, newValue, oldValue, eOpts ){
			
			budgetitemselector.ProxyCustomUrl = InvoiceGetBudgetItemProxyUrl(newValue);
			
			editForm.findField('budgetitemid_numberid').setValue('');
			editForm.findField('budgetitemid').setValue('');
			editForm.findField('budgetitemid_capexopex').setValue('');
			editForm.setValues([{id:'residual', value:'' }]);
		});
	}
});

function InvoiceDetailRestUpdate(editForm){
	var obj = editForm.getFieldValues();	
	var rest = '';
	rest = DetailGetOrLoadRest(obj.budgetitemid);	
	
	editForm.setValues([{id:'residual', value:rest }]);
}

function InvoiceGetBudgetItemProxyUrl(year){
	if(year && optimajet.budget.ExistsBudget(year)){
		return 'DDS/Get/BudgetItem.dds?B=' + year;
	}
	else{
		return optimajet.CorrectUrl('DDS/Get/BudgetItem.dds');
	}
}
</script>

<script>

function InvoiceExpenseInitToolbar(){
	var visiblility = JSON.parse(decodeURIComponent('@visibility'));
	
	if(visiblility.GlobalReadOnly || (visiblility.Settings.InvoiceExpense != undefined && visiblility.Settings.InvoiceExpense.RO)){
		return;
	}

	var buttons = ['form_InvoiceExpense_grid_toolbar_copy'];
	
	buttons.forEach(function(item){
		var b= Ext.getCmp(item);
		if(b != undefined) b.hide();
	});
	
	var grid_toolbar= optimajet.container.form_InvoiceExpense_grid_toolbar;
	var btnMaster =grid_toolbar.insert(5,{
	            id: grid_toolbar.id + '_grid_toolbar_master',
	            text: optimajet.localization.get('Master'),
	            iconCls: 'toolbar-sitemap',
	            height: 37	            
	        });
	        
        btnMaster.on('click', function(){
        	InvoiceExpenseMasterShow();
        });
        
        var btnReset =grid_toolbar.insert(6,{
	            id: grid_toolbar.id + '_grid_toolbar_reset',
	            text: optimajet.localization.get('Reset'),
	            iconCls: 'toolbar-sitemap',
	            height: 37	            
	        });
	        
        btnReset.on('click', function(){
        	InvoiceExpenseReset();
        });
}

Ext.ComponentManager.onAvailable('form_InvoiceExpense_grid', function(item) {
			
	item.columns[0].summaryRenderer = function (value, summaryData, dataIndex) {
                return Ext.String.format(optimajet.localization.get('Total') + ':');
            };            
	
	item.columns.forEach(function(col){
		if(col.dataIndex == 'amount' || col.dataIndex == 'amountcapex'){
			col.summaryType = 'sum';
		}
	});	
	
	item.on('validateedit', function(editor, e) {
			
	});
	
	item.setSize();	
	
	if(item.editingPlugin != undefined && item.editingPlugin.getEditor() != undefined){
		var editForm = item.editingPlugin.getEditor().getForm();
		editForm.findField('date').allowBlank = false;
		editForm.findField('amount').allowBlank = false;
		editForm.findField('amountcapex').readOnly = true;
	}
});

InvoiceExpenseInitToolbar();

function InvoiceExpenseMasterShow(){
	var url = 'WS/InvoiceExpenseMaster/GetContent';
	url += '?windowid=InvoiceExpenseForm';
	WorkspaceControls.ShowWindowByUrl(url,
		'divInvoiceExpenseMaster', 'InvoiceExpenseForm', '245px', '430px', 
		optimajet.localization.get('Invoice expense master for OPEX'), undefined);
}

function InvoiceExpenseMaster_Cancel(){
	optimajet.container.invoiceexpensemaster_InvoiceExpenseMaster_exit();
}

function InvoiceExpenseMaster_Save(){

	if (!optimajet.container.invoiceexpensemaster_InvoiceExpenseMaster_save())
		return;
	
	var record = optimajet.container.invoiceexpensemaster_InvoiceExpenseMaster_store.first().data;
	if(record.datefrom > record.dateto){
		var error_msg = optimajet.localization.get('Incorrect value');
		Ext.getCmp('invoiceexpensemaster_DateFrom_control').markInvalid(error_msg);
		Ext.getCmp('invoiceexpensemaster_DateTo_control').markInvalid(error_msg);
		return;
	}
	
	optimajet.container.invoiceexpensemaster_InvoiceExpenseMaster_exit();
		
	
	var startDate = new Date(record.datefrom.getFullYear(),  record.datefrom.getMonth());
	var endDate = new Date(record.dateto.getFullYear(),  record.dateto.getMonth());
	
	var store = optimajet.container.form_InvoiceExpense_store;
	
	store.data.items.forEach(function (item){
		if(item.get('amount') > 0) item.set('amount', 0)
	});
	
	var monthDiff = DateDiff.inMonths(startDate, endDate) + 1;
	var iterationAmount = parseFloat((record.amount / monthDiff).toFixed(2));
	var deltaRound = parseFloat((record.amount - iterationAmount * monthDiff).toFixed(2));
	
	for(var i = 0; i < monthDiff; i++)
	{
		var currentAmount = iterationAmount;
		if(i == 0){
			currentAmount  += deltaRound;
		}
		
		var isFind = false;
		store.data.items.forEach(function (item){
			var dt = item.get('date');
			if(dt.getMonth() == startDate.getMonth() && dt.getFullYear() == startDate.getFullYear()){
				item.set('amount', currentAmount );
				isFind = true;
				return;
			}
		});
		
		if(!isFind){
			var row = store.model.create();
			row.set('date', new Date(startDate.getFullYear(),  startDate.getMonth()));
			row.set('amount', currentAmount);
			row.set('amountcapex', 0);
			store.add(row);
		}
		
		startDate.setMonth(startDate.getMonth() + 1);
	}
	
	for(var i = store.data.items.length - 1; i >= 0 ; i--)
	{
		var item = store.data.items[i];
		if(item.get('amount') == 0 && item.get('amountcapex') == 0){
			optimajet.container.form_InvoiceExpense_store.remove(item);
		}
	}
	
	
}

function InvoiceExpenseReset(){
	InvoiceExpenseFormed(1);
}

function InvoiceExpenseFormed(isResetOpex){

	optimajet.WaitSaveDialogShow(optimajet.localization.get('Calculation') + '. ' + optimajet.localization.get('Please wait') + '...');   
	
	var vat = Ext.getCmp('form_VAT_control').value / 100;
	var entrydate = Ext.getCmp('form_EntryDate_control').value;
	var storeAllocation = optimajet.container.form_InvoiceAllocation_store;
	var store = optimajet.container.form_InvoiceExpense_store;
	
	var dataAllocation = new Array();
	var writerAllocation = storeAllocation.getProxy().writer;
	storeAllocation.data.items.forEach(function (item){
		dataAllocation.push(writerAllocation .getRecordData(item));
	});
	
	var dataExpense = new Array();
	if(!isResetOpex){
		var writerExpense = store.getProxy().writer;
		store.data.items.forEach(function (item){
			dataExpense.push(writerExpense .getRecordData(item));
		});
	}
	
	var data = new Array();
	data.push({name: 'vat', value: JSON.stringify(vat)});
	data.push({name: 'date', value: JSON.stringify(entrydate) });
	data.push({name: 'Allocation', value: JSON.stringify(dataAllocation)});
	data.push({name: 'Expense', value: JSON.stringify(dataExpense)});
	
	optimajet.PostBusinessObjectAsync('ExpenseUpdate', data, function(response){
 	 	var records= JSON.parse(response);
 	 	if (records != undefined){
			optimajet.container.form_InvoiceExpense_store.removeAll();
			records.forEach(function(item){
				var row = store.model.create();
				row.set('date', item.date);
				row.set('amount', item.amount);
				row.set('amountcapex', item.amountcapex);
				store.add(row);
			});
		}
		optimajet.WaitSaveDialogHide();
 	 });
}

function InvoiceExpenseUpdateAmount(){
	InvoiceExpenseFormed();
}
</script>

		}, true);
	}
	
	function FormFinishValidate(){	
	var valid = true;	
	var error;
			
	return valid;
}
</script>

MetaForm.Name: BudgetItem
MetaForm.Caption: Budget Items
MetaForm.Source:
<script>
optimajet.AddBackUrlReplace('#WS/BudgetItem/GetContent', '#WS/BudgetItem/GetContent?extra=' + encodeURIComponent(optimajet.getParameterInHashByName('extra')));

 var  WorkflowCorrectParamsBudgetItem = function(command,routes) {
        if (command.name != 'ToAgreement')
            return command;

        Ext.define('BudgetItemRoutes', {
            extend: 'Ext.data.Model',
            fields: [
                { type: 'string', name: 'id' },
                { type: 'string', name: 'name' }
            ]
        });

        var store = Ext.create('Ext.data.Store', {
            autoDestroy: true,
            model: 'BudgetItemRoutes',
            data: routes
        });

        var items = command.form.items;
        command.form.items = new Array();

        if (store.count() == 1) {
            defaultValue = store.first().get('id');
        }

        command.form.items.push({
            allowBlank: false,
            fieldLabel: "Route",
            labelWidth: 200,
            name: "BudgetItemRoute",
            xtype: "combo",
            store: store,
            displayField: 'name',
            valueField: 'id',
            queryMode: 'local',
            typeAhead: true,
            value: '',
            typeAhead: true,
            transform: 'stateSelect',
            forceSelection: true
        });

        command.form.items = command.form.items.concat(items);
        return command;
    }

</script>

Block.Name: Table
Form
Block.Source:
<script>

ojControls.ExtSetAllowBlank([
	'invoiceallocationmodel_Weight_control',
	'invoiceallocationmodel_Amount_control',
	'invoiceallocationmodel_CAPEXOPEX_control'], false);

Ext.getCmp('invoiceallocationmodel_Weight_control').on("change", function(cntl, newValue, oldValue, eOpts){
	InvoiceAllocationModelCheckAmount(1);
});

Ext.getCmp('invoiceallocationmodel_Amount_control').on("change", function(cntl, newValue, oldValue, eOpts){
	InvoiceAllocationModelCheckAmount(0);
});


Ext.getCmp('invoiceallocationmodel_Weight_control').setValue(100);

var invoiceAllocationModelCalcCycleBlock = 0;
function InvoiceAllocationModelCheckAmount(type){
	if(invoiceAllocationModelCalcCycleBlock )
		return;

	if(type == 0){
		var formamount = Ext.getCmp('form_Amount_control').getValue();
		var amount =  Ext.getCmp('invoiceallocationmodel_Amount_control').getValue();
		var weight = 0;
		
		if(formamount == null || amount  == null || formamount  == 0){
			weight = 0;
		}
		else{
			weight = amount / formamount  * 100;
			weight  = weight.toFixed(2);
		}
		
		invoiceAllocationModelCalcCycleBlock = 1;
		Ext.getCmp('invoiceallocationmodel_Weight_control').setValue(weight);
		invoiceAllocationModelCalcCycleBlock = 0;
	}
	else{
		var formamount = Ext.getCmp('form_Amount_control').getValue();
		var weight =  Ext.getCmp('invoiceallocationmodel_Weight_control').getValue();
		var amount = 0;
		
		if(formamount == null || weight == null || weight  == 0){
			amount = 0;
		}
		else{
			amount = formamount * weight / 100;
			amount   = amount.toFixed(2);
		}
		
		invoiceAllocationModelCalcCycleBlock = 1;
		Ext.getCmp('invoiceallocationmodel_Amount_control').setValue(amount);
		invoiceAllocationModelCalcCycleBlock = 0;
	}
}
</script>

<script>
	optimajet.container.form_OrganizationalStructure_Edit_store = undefined;

	$('#formMainErrors')[0].innerHTML = '';
}

	function FormCustomSave(callback, nothingchangesignore){

		FormPrepareData();
		
		var stores = [
			optimajet.container.form_OrganizationalStructureProject_store 
		];
		
		optimajet.StoresSave(optimajet.container.form_OrganizationalStructure_Edit_store, 
		stores, '@visibility', false, callback, FormFinishValidate, nothingchangesignore);
	}
	
	function FormSave(){
		FormCustomSave(function(respData, isSuccess)	{
			if(isSuccess && respData != null){
				optimajet.container.form_OrganizationalStructure_Edit_store.ExtensionReload(respData.processed[0]);
			 }}, true);
	}

	function FormSaveExit(){
		FormCustomSave(function(respData, isSuccess)	{
			if(isSuccess){
				$('#form_BackUrl')[0].click();
			 }
		}, true);
	}
	
	
function FormFinishValidate(){	
	var valid = true;	
	var error;
			
	return valid;
}
</script>

Dictionary
Block.Source:
<script>
Ext.ComponentManager.onAvailable('form_Project_grid', function(item) {
	
	var grid_toolbar= optimajet.container.form_Project_grid_toolbar;
	
	if(optimajet.FormCheckPermission('Project', 'Edit')){
	
		var btnClosed =grid_toolbar.insert(6,{
		    xtype: 'splitbutton',
	            id: grid_toolbar.id + '_grid_toolbar_close',
	            text: optimajet.localization.get('Set close'),
	            iconCls: 'toolbar-closed',
	            height: 37,
	            menu: [{
	            	text: optimajet.localization.get('Set open'),
	            	listeners: {
        			click: {
        				fn: function(){ 
        					ProjectSelectedUpdateStatus('1');
        				}
        			}
        		}
	            }]            
	        });
	                      
	        btnClosed.on('click', function(){	        	
	        	ProjectSelectedUpdateStatus('2');
	        });
        }
});

function ProjectSelectedUpdateStatus(value){
	
	if($('#formMainErrors').length > 0){
		$('#formMainErrors')[0].innerHTML = '';
	}	
	
	var sm = Ext.getCmp('form_Project_grid').getSelectionModel();
	var rows = sm.getSelection();
	if (rows.length < 1){
		optimajet.showInfo(optimajet.localization.get('Warning'),
			optimajet.localization.get('You have not selected any record') + '!');
		return;
	}

	optimajet.WaitSaveDialogShow(optimajet.localization.get('Setting status, please wait') + '... ');   
	
	var ids= [];
   	for (var i = 0; i < rows.length; i++)
	{
		ids.push(rows[i].get('id'));
	}
	
 	var data = [
 		{name: 'status', value: value},
        	{name: 'ids', value: ids}];
	optimajet.GetBusinessObjectAsync('ProjectStatusUpdate', data, function(response){
	 	var resp = JSON.parse(response);
	 	if (resp.success)
			ojControls.GenerateSuccessBlock(resp.message).appendTo('#formMainErrors');
		else
			ojControls.GenerateErrorBlock(resp.message).appendTo('#formMainErrors');
	 	
	 	sm.deselectAll();
	 	optimajet.container.form_Project_store.reload();
	 	
		optimajet.WaitSaveDialogHide();
	 });
}
</script>

}

InvoiceExpenseMasterInit();
